channel.title: equation on Partially Attended
channel.description: Recent content in equation on Partially Attended

item.title: Directed Graph blog setup.
item.description: I've decided to use syntaxhiligher2 to do syntax hi-lighting and a call to Yourequations.com for rendering latex on the blog. Bot Cyborg has a good description of how to get this to work on blogger. The main advantage of this approach is that the pseudo code is written in the blog posts in plain encased in a pre statement, and the equations are also just vanilla latex in a pre statement.
